greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(n,11).
formula: a(n) = 1 + 10*[11|n], where [x|y] = 1 when x divides y, 0 otherwise.
Multiplicative with a(p^e, 11) = gcd(p^e, 11). - _David W. Wilson_, Jun 12 2005
Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s)*(1+10/11^s). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 08 2011
results.author: _Mitch Harris_
